author: wn.com
title: Tony Blair’s apologies over Iraq War are ‘spin operation’ ahead of Chilcot Inquiry report, says ...
text: Nicola Sturgeon has hit out at Tony Blair over his apology for “mistakes” that led to the Iraq War. The Scottish First Minister accused Mr Blair of conducting a “spin operation” now that the long-awaited Chilcot Inquiry is believed to be close to publication. It was reported on Thursday that Sir John Chilcot, who began his work reviewing Britain’s decision to invade Iraq in 2009, was about to write to David Cameron with a timetable for his report.
